short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A snappy OSINT searching tool that turns your search bar into a dedicated OSINT engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on is designed to save you time during your osint investigation.

★ KEY POINTS  
    • 2 high-performance search modes (by tag or by Indicator of Compromise).
    • Database of over 200 OSINT resources (website, github tools) updated monthly.
    • Automatic pre-filling of fields for certain well-known OSINT sites.
    • OSINT resources associated with various domains (E.g Cryptomoney, Space, Sea, Internet, War, Forest).

★ QUICKSTART - How does it work ? 
    1. Start using it by putting the keyword "snaposint" on your search bar.
    2. Then, use one of our 2 search modes:
        • By using tag (E.g. "socialmedia", "map",  "phone", "plane", "france" or "imint").
        • By using an Indicator of compromise (E.g. Email address, Phone number, File Hash, Bitcoin/Ethereum address or Ip address).
    3. Finally the app will suggest you the most appropriate OSINT resource among more than 200 listed. Navigate to the one that interest you and be redirected to the resource. 

★ RECOMMENDATIONS AND TIPS for a better experience
    • Use arrow keys for navigation through SnapOSINT suggestions.
    • Get tag suggestion by pressing sequentially spacebar and del keys.

★ PRIVACY
No tracking, no advertising, and nothing else nefarious.

★ ABOUT ME
A Cybersecurity & Intelligence engineer who develops things he hopes will be useful.
